title: Linda Robson and super glam daughter Lauren stun at Pride of Britain
text:

Linda Robson and her daughter Lauren wow together in long black gowns on the red carpet.

The pair looked close as they each oozed glamour in stunning evening dresses.

Lauren wore a velvet frock with a thigh split, paired with sparkly silver earrings and red lipstick - finished off with strappy stilettos.

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

(Image: Doug Peters/EMPICS Entertainment)

Her mum wore a glamorous dress with mesh detailing on the top, with her blonde locks straightened.

They looked stunning as they wowed the crowd ahead of the ceremony.
description: Linda Robson and her daughter Lauren attend Pride of Britain 2019 together wearing matching black gowns
